thread.section_title: B&H Photo-Video Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of B&H Photo-Video | www.bhphotovideo.com | 130 of 7355
thread.title: Tim

author: Tim
title: Tim
text: I am long time customer, measured in years. I was a bit agitated when the slide converter I just ordered. only came with one of each slide and film holders. At a minimum there should be two of each. I ordered two extra slide holders, but was unable to find extra film holders at the website. Perhaps I will have to hunt elsewhere on B&H websites. Very annoying and a waste of my time.
